summary: Completed comprehensive testing of PDF Reading Timer application. All core features working correctly including PDF upload/analysis, timer controls (play/pause/reset), paragraph navigation, 'Iniciar desde aquí' functionality, presentation mode, and notification settings. The critical bug fix (playNotificationSound function moved before useEffect) has been verified - no JavaScript errors.

PDF upload and analysis endpoint working (POST /api/analyze-pdf)
Non-PDF files correctly rejected with 400 error
Question time calculation accurate (35 seconds per question)
Timer play button starts timer correctly
Timer pause button pauses timer correctly
Elapsed time display updates in real-time
'Iniciar desde aquí' button starts from specific paragraph
Alert time inputs (1er aviso, 2do aviso) working
Low time alert useEffect correctly placed after playNotificationSound function
All data-testid attributes present for testing
critical_code_review_comments: Bug fix verified: playNotificationSound function is now defined at line 300, before the useEffect at line 388 that uses it
context_for_next_testing_agent: All features tested and working. Test PDFs available at /app/*.pdf. Backend tests in /app/backend/tests/test_pdf_analysis.py. The critical bug (playNotificationSound before initialization) has been fixed and verified.
